Posts.Content: Nov 2, 2007 03:23PM keamac wrote: My drain tubes were under my right breast because my tumor was inside close to the chest wall.  They weren't really uncomfortable, just got in the way.  I had them in for two weeks, but the last day was when they really hurt.  I sure was glad to see them go!!
